H0.text: Electrical engineering is the career that a student studying biotechnology most likely pursues.

H1.text: Astronomy is the career that a student studying biotechnology most likely pursues.

H2.text: Agricultural research is the career most likely pursued by a student studying biotechnology.

H3.text: Geology is the career that a student studying biotechnology most likely pursues.

A4.text: Crop biotechnology is one aspect of agricultural biotechnology which has been greatly developed upon in recent times.
